_meanings:
{@--1@} Deep entrance into,
ardent devotion or 
attachment, close application.

{@--8@} Seating
in the proper places, giving seats
to; {#kriyatAM samAjasaMniveSaH#} <ls>U. 7.</ls>

{@--10@} An open space near
a town where people assemble for
amusement, exercise &c.

{@--11@} The
collective position of an asterism.
